document_data.name: ''Paper of Forms''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Paper of forms''''' was an [[enchanted]] sheet of [[paper]] that could be transformed into various objects with an application of [[origami]] skills.
document_data.Description: ''Paper of forms'' was a colored sheet of paper.

Powers.Creation: A sheet of ''paper of forms'' could be created by an experienced maker of wondrous items with the use of ''[[animate objects]]'' and ''[[major creation]]'' [[spell]]s.
